nodes.asset_description: Portrait photo of a young woman with shoulder-length blonde hair, wearing a white textured button-up shirt and light beige pants, seated with one knee up and her right hand resting on her cheek. Soft warm lighting, neutral tones, transparent background around the subject.

Right-side vertical torn paper panel with a rough deckled left edge and subtle warm-gray paper texture. The panel is light gray (#e7e4e0) with soft grain; its top-right and bottom-right corners angle inward, revealing the beige background.
